ValidationRule.description: Depending on the Timesheet Status do not allow making modifications.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), "Approved"), NOT(OR($Profile.Name = "System Administrator",$Profile.Name = "Data Load API Only",$Profile.Name ="System Admin API Only",$Profile.Name ="GDMFSL FSA")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: It is not allowed to modify an approved Timesheet.
